titleStmt.title: The growth of error being an exercitation concerning the rise and progress of Arminianism and more especially Socinianism, both abroad and now of late, in England / by a lover of truth and peace.
titleStmt.author: Lobb, Stephen, d. 1699.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Stephen Lobb.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
